name: Urban Explorer: walk 'n' snoop through hidden facts 'n' snacks - Plan A
description: The hustle and bustle of old downtown Sao Paulo, Brazil, conceal wonders that even many locals are unaware of, such as the bronze statue of a life-sized male human at a garden that has a polished finger which differs from the whole body: along the day, for decades, some people believe rubbing that finger and making a wish will make dreams come true. Many more people swarm by whimsical trinket shops and street food dealers nearby. Tons of great sights are worth to be photographed, lovely souvenirs to be acquired and tasty snacks to be sampled.  Plus your guide knows every corner and is fluent in English and the local language, Portuguese. It's going to be fun!
